reuters.title: JOHNSTOWN SAVINGS BANK FSB <JSBK> 1ST QTR NET
reuters.body: Shr 33 cts vs not given Net 642,484 vs 362,883 NOTE: Company went public in October 1986. Net includes pretax loan loss provisions of 90,000 dlrs vs 56,250 dlrs and gain on sale of securities of 113,432 dlrs vs 88,946 dlrs. Reuter 
